c3h8.java.util
Class FluentProperty<Owner,Value>

java.lang.Object
  c3h8.java.util.Property<Value>
      c3h8.java.util.FluentProperty<Owner,Value>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFluentProperty<Owner,Value>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluentCollectionProperty
public class FluentProperty<Owner,Value>
extends Property<Value>
implements IFluentProperty<Owner,Value>

A Property with support of fluent interface.

 public class Person {
    public final FluentProperty<String> firstName = new FluentProperty<String>(null);
    public final FluentProperty<String> lastName = new FluentProperty<String>(null);
 }
 Person person = new Person();
 person.firstName.with("John")
       .lastName.with("Smith");

Author:
Volodymyr Frolov <frolov.volodymyr@gmail.com>

Constructor Detail

FluentProperty

public FluentProperty(Owner owner,
                      Value value)
Create new property with support of fluent interface. Assing an owner and value to new property.

Parameters:
owner - owner object of a fluent property.
value - initial value of fluent property.

Returns:

with

protected Owner with()
Get an owner of a property.

Returns:
owner of a property which can be used as a return value for some other implementations of fluent interface properties.
